title: The Chalice and the Blade: Our History, Our Future
description: The legacy of the sacred feminine. The Chalice and the Blade tells a new story of our cultural origins. It shows that warfare and the war of the sexes are neither divinely nor biologically ordained. It provides verification that a better future is possibleâ€”and is in fact firmly rooted in the haunting dramas of what happened in our past.
author: Riane Eisler
